Type.Name: FormatterAssemblyStyle

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FormatterAssemblyStyle extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

summary.para: Indicates the method that will be used during deserialization for locating and loading assemblies.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle Full = int32(1)

summary.para: In full mode, the assembly used during deserialization must match exactly the assembly used during serialization. The method of the class is used to load the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle Simple = int32(0)

summary.para: In simple mode, the assembly used during deserialization need not match exactly the assembly used during serialization. Specifically, the version numbers need not match as the method is used to load the assembly.
